short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the 3 saves per day limit on Pixlr apps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A while ago, the team behind the Pixlr suite of apps (https://pixlr.com/suite) added a limit on how many times you can save per day. What this extension does is remove that limit every time you reload.

[NOT AN OFFICIAL PIXLR PRODUCT]
